thread.title: Here's The New Boston Dynamics Robot You’re Not Supposed To See Yet
thread.title_full: Here's The New Boston Dynamics Robot You’re Not Supposed To See Yet

title: Here's The New Boston Dynamics Robot You’re Not Supposed To See Yet
text:
Blacklist story Blacklist domain At a recent conference, Boston Dynamics founder Marc Raibert gave one very lucky audience a sneak peak at their newest robot "Handle," a terrifyingly cool combination of limbs and wheels. An audience member captured the presentation on tape, but upon uploading the video was promptly asked to blur out the footage (which we didn't even know was possible ). [Update: They un-blurred it] If you don't feel like seeing the rest of the auditorium, here's a close-up (warning: it's pretty loud): This bot may very well take the top spot in the running for future overlord. 
Digg is what the internet is talking about, right now. It's also the website you are currently on. AFTER FIVE YEARS APART
